sections.text: Vishal Joshi Full Stack AI Engineer Current Organisation: Virtualis Analytica Web Solutions LLP
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY Machine Learning Engineer with strong math background. Experienced in Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Web Development and Mobile Development.

SKILLS Operating System Windows, Linux, Mac OSX, Ubuntu Languages Python, HTML, PHP, CSS, Java, Dart Machine learning libraries TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch Frameworks React.js , Django, Node.js Databases MySQL, PostgreSQL, Mongodb IDE Xcode, Anaconda Navigator, Visual Studio, Pycharm Project Tracking Software Jira, Trello, Notion Others Shell-Scripting, Git Certification MERN Stack Developer, HTML 5

Project Experience PROJECT I: Number Hitters - Lottery number predicting platform Client – Australia Based October 2021- Jan 2022 Designation: Team Lead Description: A Solution to predict lottery number with highest probability based on previous 20 years data which is used to train a machine learning model and predictions from that model are stored into the database. This is a SaaS based platform where users can purchase different subscription plans and access functionalities based on selected plan. Contribution: • Designed whole UI Layout • Developed Web Application to serve users. • Developed XGBoost Model • Wrote Cronjob scripts to automate daily predictions. • Provided Operation Support and defect fixing to enable smooth Ingestion. • Provided cost efficient solution to run ML model on daily basis. Technologies and Environment used: React.js, Express.js, Node.js, Python, MySQL

PROJECT II: Appymonk - One stop solution for MSMEs Client – Indian August 2021- Present Designation: Full Stack AI Engineer Description: SaaS based platform for small companies to manage employees, expenses, invoices, purchase lists, quotations and payroll of employees based on attendance through facial recognition. Contribution: • Build Face Detection and Recognition Model • Developed Expense module. • Integrated Tesseract to enable OCR to read bills. • Configured AWS server and installed docker to run 3 individual services in single server - website, Users panel, Admin Panel. • Provided Extensive support to shift servers from big rock to AWS Technologies and Environment used: React.js, Express.js, Node.js, Python, MySQL PROJECT III: 1031 exchange - a collaborative real estate/property exchange eco-system Client – US based Institute April 2020 – July 2020 Designation: Data Scientist Description: A solution is a swap of one investment property for another that allows capital gains taxes. An exchange can only be made with like kind properties by analyzing the value and exchange IRS rules limit use with vacation properties. Contribution: • Provided design recommendations and thought leadership to stakeholders that improvedreview processes and resolved technical problems • Contributed in Generic Ingestion framework having config-based approach • Design and development of Web Application to support Customer Migration. • Developed adhoc scripts to automate manual process. • Contributed as Admin and managed user onboarding. • Provided Operation Support and defect fixing to enable smooth Ingestion. Technologies and Environment used: Java, PHP, Python, Mongodb

PROJECT IV: Streaming Predictive Analysis Client – US based Designation: Data scientist September 2019 Description: A state of art analytical predictive dashboard that compiles content from all online sources into meaningful impact analysis. Using the BERT algorithm, it identifies all hidden intent and classifies the entire analysis into sentimental scoring as well to help organizations evaluate their products, services, and events. Apt value-adding services for organizations and businesses indulged in public dealings. Contribution: • Defined and managed data quality control measures for New Accounts. • Built an end-to-end data analytical and dashboarding solution that analyzes streaming online data through research news sources. • Research papers and present meaningful insights to research stakeholders. • Performing Extractive Text Summarization with the help of BERT • Solved performance issues, optimized solutions. • Developed workflow for scheduling jobs using Scheduling tool. Technologies and Environment used: TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, python Java, Event Engine, SQL, Splunk, Service Now, Git PROJECT V: Automated attendance solution Designation: Developer April 2019 Description: A fully automated solution that uses a live camera feed to identify employees walking on the premises and record their attendance. No need for the manual punch in or finger scan, a complete touchless solution for attendance management. Easily integrable with payroll management, it paves way for an automated Employee attendance and payroll management solution. Contribution • Part of team where we developed a solution using python • Published reports in the form ofpie chart, graphs, Bar Technologies used: python, Mongo DB, HTML, CSS, JavaScript.

Vishal Joshi Full Stack AI Engineer Current Organisation: Virtualis Analytica Web Solutions LLP
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY Machine Learning Engineer with strong math background. Experienced in Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Web Development and Mobile Development.

No need for the manual punch in or finger scan, a complete touchless solution for attendance management. Easily integrable with payroll management, it paves way for an automated Employee attendance and payroll management solution. EDUCATION B. Tech (DIT university) 87% Intermediate 77%
